mapper.select: SELECT team_code AS teamCode ,team_name_korean AS teamNameKorean FROM haksa_team WHERE team_is_used = '유' AND team_name_korean LIKE '%학과'

SELECT ilban_human.human_name AS humanName ,haksa_department.dept_name_korean AS deptNameKorean ,haksa_team.team_name_korean AS teamNameKorean ,haksa_job_rank.job_rank_name_korean AS jobRankNameKorean ,ilban_myprofile.human_phone_number AS humanPhoneNumber ,ilban_myprofile.human_email AS humanEmail ,haksa_job_group.job_group_code AS jobGroupCode ,haksa_job_group.job_group_name AS jobGroupName FROM ilban_appointment INNER JOIN ilban_human ON ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_human.student_teacher_no INNER JOIN haksa_job_rank ON ilban_appointment.job_rank_code = haksa_job_rank.job_rank_code INNER JOIN ilban_myprofile ON ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_myprofile.student_teacher_no INNER JOIN haksa_department ON ilban_appointment.dept_code = haksa_department.dept_code INNER JOIN haksa_team ON ilban_appointment.team_code = haksa_team.team_code INNER JOIN haksa_job_group ON ilban_appointment.job_group_code = haksa_job_group.job_group_code LEFT JOIN ilban_appointment_permanent ON ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_appointment_permanent.appointment_school_personnel_number LEFT JOIN ilban_appointment_temporary ON ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_appointment_temporary.appointment_school_personnel_number LEFT JOIN ilban_other_appointment ON ilban_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number = ilban_other_appointment.appointment_school_personnel_number
GROUP BY haksa_team.team_name_korean ASC
